name: Tic Tac Toe ∞
description:
A modern version of ancient classic game. Player plays X and the Ai O, taking turns marking the spaces in a 3×3 grid. The one who succeeds in placing three respective marks in a horizontal, vertical, or diagonal row wins the game. In next game the winner of the previous game is the one who starts the game. If no one wins, it’s a draw.

Save paper, pencils and your time - play Tic Tac Toe on your iPhone or iPad.

Tic Tac Toe app offers:
- 4 different levels; easy, medium, hard, expert
- game statistics
- hours of fun playing
- perfect for wasting time while on the way to school or work
- takes less than 1min to finish the game so perfect game for those who do not have much free time
- kids love it and keeps them occupied for hours!
